headline: ON Semiconductor (NasdaqGS:ON) Climbs 12% In A Week Amid Market Volatility
summary: Last week, major indexes slid amid new U.S. restrictions on chip exports to China, impacting several technology stocks. During this period, ON Semiconductor (NasdaqGS:ON) saw a price increase of 12%, a notable contrast to declines faced by other semiconductor companies like Nvidia and AMD, which were directly affected by the export limitations. The broader market's positive momentum of 8% over the last seven days may have contributed to ON's performance. As other chipmakers grapple with new...

headline: Big banks report Q1 beats, China stops taking Boeing deliveries: Morning Buzz
summary: The major averages were fractionally higher near noon, adding slightly to yesterday’s gains as investors reacted to fresh headlines on U.S.-China trade tensions and a new round of corporate earnings. Markets are attempting to stabilize after a rocky stretch, but much of the tone is being shaped by President Trump’s latest tariff decisions. After last week’s escalation, he’s now backing off slightly, offering temporary relief on key consumer electronics and signaling possible concessions for the
